CodeList.Name: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - Record sex as observed.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Observed Sex

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - How old are you now?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - How Old Are You Now

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - How many years in all did you spend studying in school, college or university?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Years Studying in School or College

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - What is your current marital status?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Current Marital Status

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - Which describes your main work status best?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Describes Main Work Status Best

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Remembering to do important things?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Remembering to Do Important Things

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Analysing and finding solutions to problems in day-to-day life?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Finding Solutions to Problems

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Generally understanding what people say?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Understanding What People Say

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Starting and maintaining a conversation?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Starting or Maintaining Conversation

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Standing up from sitting down?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Standing Up From Sitting Down

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Moving around inside your home?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Moving Around Inside Your Home

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting out of your home?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Getting Out of Your Home

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Eating?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Eating

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD4-Staying By Yourself for a Few Days
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Staying by yourself for a few days?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Staying By Yourself for a Few Days

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD4-Get Along with People Close to You
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting along with people who are close to you?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Get Along with People Close to You

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Making new friends?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Making New Friends

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Sexual activities?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Sexual Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, on how many days did you reduce or completely miss household work because of your health condition?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Reduce or Miss Household Work

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD4-Miss Work Half Day or More
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, on how many days did you miss work for half a day or more because of your health condition?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Miss Work Half Day or More

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - Because of your health condition, in the past 30 days how much difficulty did you have in: Did you earn less money as the result of a health condition?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Earn Less Money

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - Because of your health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Doing your most important household tasks well?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Doing Important Household Tasks

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - Because of your health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting all the household work done that you needed to do?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Getting Household Work Done Needed

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - Because of your health condition, in the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting your household work done as quickly as needed?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Getting Household Work Done Quickly

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - Because of your health condition, in the past 30 days how much difficulty did you have in: Doing your most important work/school tasks well?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Doing Important Work or School Tasks

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD4-Getting All Work Done You Need
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - Because of your health condition, in the past 30 days how much difficulty did you have in: Getting all the work done that you need to do?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Getting All Work Done You Need

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD4-Getting Work Done Quickly as Needed
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - Because of your health condition, in the past 30 days how much difficulty did you have in: Getting your work done as quickly as needed?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Getting Work Done Quickly as Needed

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD4-Had to Work at a Lower Level
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - Because of your health condition, in the past 30 days how much difficulty did you have in: Have you had to work at a lower level because of a health condition?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Had to Work at a Lower Level

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD4-Problem Because of Barriers in World
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days: How much of a problem did you have because of barriers or hindrances in the world around you?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Problem Because of Barriers in World

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days: How much of a problem did you have living with dignity because of the attitudes and actions of others?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Problem Living With Dignity

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD4-Time Spend on Your Health Condition
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days: How much time did you spend on your health condition, or its consequences?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Time Spend on Your Health Condition

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days: How much has your health been a drain on the financial resources of you or your family?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Drain on Financial Resources

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days: How much of a problem did your family have because of your health problems?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Problem Did Your Family Have

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days: How much of a problem did you have in doing things by yourself for relaxation or pleasure?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Problem Doing Things for Relaxation

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - Living situation at time of interview.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Living Situation at Interview

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - Overall, in the past 30 days, how many days were these difficulties present?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - How Many Days Difficulties Present

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD4-Days Unable to Carry Out Activities
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, for how many days were you totally unable to carry out your usual activities or work because of any health condition?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Days Unable to Carry Out Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, not counting the days that you were totally unable, for how many days did you cut back or reduce your usual activities or work because of any health condition?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - How Many Days Reduce Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Standing for long periods such as 30 minutes?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Standing for Long Periods

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: WD4-Dealing With People You Do Not Know
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Dealing with people you do not know?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Dealing With People You Do Not Know

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Maintaining a friendship?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Maintaining a Fiendship

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Your day-to-day work?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Your Day-to-Day Work

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Taking care of your household responsibilities?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Care of Household Responsibilities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Learning a new task, for example, learning how to get to a new place?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Learning a New Task

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Joining in community activities (for example, festivities, religious or other activities) in the same way as anyone else can?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Problem Joining Community Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: How much have you been emotionally affected by your health problems?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Emotionally Affected by Health

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Concentrating on doing something for ten minutes?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Concentrating for Ten Minutes

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Walking a long distance such as a kilometre [or equivalent]?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Walking a Long Distance

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Washing your whole body?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Washing Your Whole Body

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting dressed?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered - Getting Dressed

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12 + 24-Item Interviewer Questionnaire Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire WHODAS 2.0 12+24-item Version Interviewer-administered Test Code Terminology
